name: HR Policy & Benefits Finder
description: Helps HR generalists and employees quickly find policy information, benefits details, PTO guidelines, and HR procedures from company documentation.

friction_addressed.description: Answering the same policy and benefits questions repeatedly from employees
Finding policies, procedures, and benefits details to answer questions
Answering benefits questions and directing employees to the right resources

value_proposition.primary_benefit: Instant answers to policy and benefits questions without HR intervention
secondary_benefits: Reduced repetitive questions for HR team

required.name: OneDriveAndSharePoint
required.reason: Agent needs access to employee handbook, benefits guides, policy documents, and HR procedures
required.setup_instructions: Configure with SharePoint sites/folders containing: (1) employee handbook, (2) benefits guides and summaries, (3) HR policies and procedures, (4) leave and PTO guidelines, (5) compliance documentation

optional.name: WebSearch
optional.reason: Can search for external resources like government benefits information or labor law references
optional.setup_instructions: Enable if you want agent to supplement with external information

actions.description: This agent retrieves information but does not update employee records, process requests, or make policy decisions.

conversation_starters.title: PTO policy
conversation_starters.text: How much PTO do I get per year?

conversation_starters.title: Benefits enrollment
conversation_starters.text: When is open enrollment and how do I sign up?

conversation_starters.title: Leave policy
conversation_starters.text: What's the policy for parental leave?

conversation_starters.title: Remote work
conversation_starters.text: What are the guidelines for working remotely?

conversation_starters.title: Expense reimbursement
conversation_starters.text: How do I submit an expense report?

conversation_starters.title: Holiday schedule
conversation_starters.text: What are the company holidays this year?

prerequisites: SharePoint site or folder with HR documentation

admin_considerations: Review which policies should be accessible
Consider deploying to all employees for self-service
Ensure benefits information is updated annually
Add disclaimer about verifying with HR for complex situations
